description: ff. 12. 190 x 135; 150 x 100 mm. 19 lin. cop. by al-Dhahabī (d. 748/1348) - many samāʻ - notes on title page, margins, and fol. 4a-12b. anon. Incip.: ... آنا ابو زرعة طاهر بن محمد بن طاهر المقدسى سنة احدى وستىن وخمس مائة

title.@value: al-Muntaqá min gharāʼib Sunan Ibn Mājah

subject: Ibn Mājah, Muḥammad ibn Yazīd, d. 887—Sunan
member_of_collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
